text: Waverly is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) in Codington County, South Dakota, United States. The population was 37 at the 2010 census. The community derives its name from the Waverley Novels. ==Geography== Waverly is located in eastern Codington County northeast of Watertown, the county seat. It is east of Exit 185 on Interstate 29. According to the United States Census Bureau, the Waverly CDP has a total area of , all land. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Codington County, South Dakota Category:Census-designated places in South Dakota
title: Waverly, South Dakota
